import glob

import frontmatter as FM

for path in glob.glob('**/*.md', recursive=True):
  if path.startswith('output'):
    continue

  print(path)
  with open(path, 'r') as fp:

    # body = next(docs)

  original_url = frontmatter['URL']

  category = tags[0] if tags else None

  if category:

  output_lines.insert(-1, f'---')
